bower-buildkit

The bowerized version of the buildkit, precompiled for inclusion.

Install Bower in your client

Ensure that Bower is installed and configured in your application.

Usage

From your client application bower.json:

json "dependencies": { "buildkit": "http://git.blurb.com/blurb/bower-buildkit.git" }

then run:

$ bower install

Where to find files

The buildkit's assets are located in this repository's dist/ directory.

  • Github
